H0.text: Digestion and absorption of proteins in the liver is the best description of the gastrointestinal function of bile salts, which play a crucial role in gastrointestinal homeostasis and digestion.

H1.text: Digestion and absorption of fats in the small intestine is the best description of the gastrointestinal function of bile salts, which play a crucial role in gastrointestinal homeostasis and digestion.

H2.text: Digestion and absorption of carbohydrates in the liver is the best description of bile saltsâ€™ gastrointestinal function, as bile salts play a crucial role in gastrointestinal homeostasis and digestion.

H3.text: Digestion and absorption of cholesterol in the large intestine is the best description of the gastrointestinal function of bile salts, which play a crucial role in gastrointestinal homeostasis and digestion.

A4.text: Bile acids facilitate digestion of dietary fats and oils.

A5.text: Bile acids serve as micelle-forming surfactants, which encapsulate nutrients, facilitating their absorption.
